meanings.definition: Very small structures, typically on the scale of nanometers.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying nanostructures to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: The lab is equipped with advanced tools to analyze nanostructures.
meanings.sent3: The tiny nanostructures decided to have a party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like nanostructures forming intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nanostructures under the electron microscope was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Structures with dimensions in the nanometer range.
meanings.sent1: Nanostructures play a crucial role in the development of new technologies.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in manufacturing nanostructures for various applications.
meanings.sent3: The nanostructures whispered secrets to each other in the research lab.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of interconnected nanostructures, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The artist's imagination soared, envisioning a world built from nanostructures.
